#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef int ALL_OF_YOU_ARE_HANZHONGBALLS;
typedef long long ll;
typedef unsigned long long ull;
typedef vector/**/<int> vi;
typedef pair<int,int> /**/ii;
typedef vector<ii> vii;
typedef vector<ll> vll;
typedef pair<ll,ll> pll;
#define IN inline
#define RE register
#define FI first
#define SE second
#define random(x) (rand()%x)
#define mid(a,b,c) (a+b+c-max(max(a,b),c)-min(min(a,b),c))
const int maxn=100005;
int a[2][maxn<<1],l,r;
int main(){
	int n,nn,xi;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	nn=(n<<1);
	for(RE int i=1;i<nn;++i){
		scanf("%d",a[1]+i);
	}
	l=2;r=nn-2;
	for(RE int i=2;i<=n;++i){
		xi=(i&1);
		for(RE int j=l;j<=r;++j){
			a[xi][j]=mid(a[xi^1][j-1],a[xi^1][j],a[xi^1][j+1]);
			if(a[xi][j]==a[xi][j-1]){
				if(j==n||j==n+1){
					printf("%d\n",a[xi][j]);
					return 0;
				}
				a[xi^1][j]=a[xi][j];
				if(j<n) l=j+1;
				else r=j-2;
			}
		}
		if(l==i) ++l;
		if(r==nn-i) --r;
	}
	printf("%d\n",a[(n&1)][n]);
	return 0;
}

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef int ALL_OF_YOU_ARE_HANZHONGBALLS;
typedef long long ll;
typedef unsigned long long ull;
typedef vector/**/<int> vi;
typedef pair<int,int> /**/ii;
typedef vector<ii> vii;
typedef vector<ll> vll;
typedef pair<ll,ll> pll;
#define IN inline
#define RE register
#define FI first
#define SE second
#define random(x) (rand()%x)
const int maxn=200005;
int n,nn,a[maxn];
bool chck(int x){
	int ret=(a[n]>=x);
	for(int i=n-1;i;i--){
		if((a[i]>=x)!=ret&&(a[nn-i]>=x)!=ret){
			ret^=1;
		}else return ret;
	}return ret;
}
int main(){
	scanf("%d",&n);
	nn=(n<<1);
	int l,r,mid;
	for(int i=1;i<nn;i++){
		scanf("%d",a+i);
	}
	l=1;r=nn-1;
	while(l<=r){
		mid=(l+r)>>1;
		if(chck(mid)){
			l=mid+1;
		}else{
			r=mid-1;
		}
	}
	printf("%d\n",l-1);
	return 0;
}

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef int ALL_OF_YOU_ARE_HANZHONGBALLS;
typedef long long ll;
typedef unsigned long long ull;
typedef vector/**/<int> vi;
typedef pair<int,int> /**/ii;
typedef vector<ii> vii;
typedef vector<ll> vll;
typedef pair<ll,ll> pll;
#define IN inline
#define RE register
#define FI first
#define SE second
#define random(x) (rand()%x)
#define mid(a,b,c) (a+b+c-max(max(a,b),c)-min(min(a,b),c))
const int maxn=100005;
int a[2][maxn<<1],l,r;
int main(){
	int n,nn,xi;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	nn=(n<<1);
	for(RE int i=1;i<nn;++i){
		scanf("%d",a[1]+i);
	}
	l=2;r=nn-2;
	for(RE int i=2;i<=n;++i){
		xi=(i&1);
		for(RE int j=l;j<=r;++j){
			a[xi][j]=mid(a[xi^1][j-1],a[xi^1][j],a[xi^1][j+1]);
			if(a[xi][j]==a[xi][j-1]){
				if(j==n||j==n+1){
					printf("%d\n",a[xi][j]);
					return 0;
				}
				a[xi^1][j]=a[xi][j];
				if(j<n) l=j+1;
				else r=j-2;
			}
		}
		if(l==i) ++l;
		if(r==nn-i) --r;
	}
	printf("%d\n",a[(n&1)][n]);
	return 0;
}

bool chck(int x){
	bool ret=(a[n]>=x);
	for(int i=n-1;i;i--){
		if(((a[i]>=x)^ret)&&((a[nn-i]>=x)^ret)) ret=!ret;
		else return ret;
	}return ret;
}
int main(){
	scanf("%d",&n);
	nn=(n<<1);
	int l,r,mid;
	for(int i=1;i<nn;i++) scanf("%d",a+i);
	l=1;r=nn-1;
	while(l<=r){
		mid=(l+r)>>1;
		if(chck(mid)) l=mid+1;
		else r=mid-1;
	}printf("%d\n",l-1);
	return 0;
}

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const int N = 100005;
int n, a[N * 2];
bool check(int mid) {
	for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {
		if ((a[n - i] <= mid && a[n - i - 1] <= mid) || (a[n + i] <= mid && a[n + i + 1] <= mid)) return true;
		if ((a[n - i] > mid && a[n - i - 1] > mid) || (a[n + i] > mid && a[n + i + 1] > mid)) return false;
	}
	return a[1] <= mid;
}
int main() {
	scanf("%d", &n);
	for (int i = 1; i <= 2 * n - 1; i++)
		scanf("%d", &a[i]);
	int lo = 1, hi = 2 * n - 1;
	while (lo < hi) {
		int mid = (lo + hi) >> 1;
		if (check(mid))
			hi = mid;
		else
			lo = mid + 1;
	}
	printf("%d\n", lo);
	return 0;
}

type Answer = Int
answer :: Answer -> IO ()
answer = print

solve :: Int -> [Int] -> Int
solve n = bin 2 (2 * n - 2)
  where
    bin l g
      | l == g    = const g
      | r == 1    = bool l g . gte g
      | otherwise = bool . bin l (m - 1) <*> bin m g <*> gte m
      where
        r = g - l
        m = l + r `div` 2
    gte x = go . foldr ((:) . (x <=)) []
    go (x : y : xs)
      | x == y    = left   2 x y $ zip [3 ..] xs
      | otherwise = left   0 x y $ zip [3 ..] xs
    left   l w z xs@((i, x) : xs')
      | i >= n    = middle l w z xs
      | z /= x    = left   l w x xs'
      | otherwise = left   i x x xs'
    middle l w z xs@((i, x) : xs')
      | i >  n    = right  m w z xs
      | z /= x    = right  m w x xs'
      | otherwise = x
      where
        m = 2 * n - l
    right m w z [(i, x)]
      | z /= x    = w
      | otherwise = x
    right m w z ((i, x) : xs)
      | i >  m    = w
      | z /= x    = right m w x xs
      | otherwise = x

valid :: Int -> [Int] -> Bool
valid k = go
  where
    median (x, y, z)
      | max x (min y z) == x && min x (max y z) == x = x
      | max y (min z x) == y && min y (max z x) == y = y
      | max z (min x y) == z && min z (max x y) == z = z
    inner (x : y : z : xs) = median (x, y, z) : inner (y : z : xs)
    inner               _  = []
    go [x] = x == k
    go  xs = go $ inner xs

solve :: Int -> [Int] -> Int
solve n = search 2 (2 * n - 2)
  where
    bin x = foldr ((:) . (x <=)) []
    search k x xs
      | k == x     = x
      | x - k == 1 = if go (bin x xs) then x else k
      | go bs      = search m x xs
      | otherwise  = search k (m - 1) xs
      where
        m  = k + (x - k) `div` 2
        bs = bin m xs
    go (x : y : xs)
      | x == y    = left   2 y y $ zip [3 ..] xs
      | otherwise = left   0 x y $ zip [3 ..] xs
    left   l w z xs@((i, x) : xs')
      | i >= n    = middle l w z xs
      | z /= x    = left   i w x xs'
      | otherwise = left   l x x xs'
    middle l w z xs@((i, x) : xs')
      | i >  n    = right  m w z xs
      | z /= x    = right  m w x xs'
      | otherwise = x
      where
        m = 2 * n - l
    right m w z [(i, x)] = w
    right m w z ((i, x) : xs)
      | i >  m    = w
      | z /= x    = right m w x xs
      | otherwise = x

fscanf(STDIN, '%d', $N);
$A = trim(fgets(STDIN));
$A = explode(' ', $A);

function _next($arr) {
	$result = [];
	for ($i = 0; $i < count($arr) - 2; $i++) {
		$tmp = array_slice($arr, $i, 3);
		asort($tmp);
		$tmp = array_values($tmp);
		$result[] = $tmp[1];
	}
	return $result;
}

while (--$N) {

  | k -> read_ints ((Scanf.scanf " %d" (fun x -> x)) :: accu) (k-1)

let max3 a b c = max (max a b) c
let min3 a b c = min (min a b) c

let median a b c = a + b + c - (max3 a b c) - (min3 a b c)

let rec medians t acc a b = function
  | [] -> if t then [List.hd acc] else List.rev acc
  | hd :: tl -> medians (t && hd = b) ((median a b hd) :: acc) b hd tl


let rec top = function
  | [] -> 0
  | [a] -> a
  | a :: b :: tl -> top (medians (a=b) [] a b tl)

  | 0 -> List.rev accu
  | k -> read_ints ((Scanf.scanf " %d" (fun x -> x)) :: accu) (k-1)

let check x =
  let rec aux = function
    | 0 -> a.(0) >= x
    | k -> if (a.(k-1) >= x) = (a.(k) >= x) then a.(k) >= x
           else if (a.(2*n-1-k) >= x) = (a.(2*n-2-k) >= x) then a.(2*n-2-k) >= x
           else aux (k-1) in
  aux (n-1)

let rec bsearch l r = if r = l+1 then l else let m = (l+r)/2 in if check m then bsearch m r else bsearch l m

let () = print_int (bsearch 1 (2*n))

let head3 lst =
	match lst with
	| e1 :: e2 :: e3 :: _ -> [e1; e2; e3]
	| _ -> []

let median [a; b; c] =
	let [_; m; _] = List.sort compare [a; b; c] in m

let upstairs step =
	let rec loop lst acc =
		match head3 lst with
		| [] -> acc
		| xs -> loop (List.tl lst) (xs :: acc)
	in
	loop step []
	|> List.map median

let solve step =
	let rec loop step =
		(* step is never [] *)
		match step with
		| [_] -> step
		| _ -> loop (upstairs step)
	in
	List.hd (loop step)

	let n = read_int () in
	let a =
		read_line ()
		|> Str.split (Str.regexp " ")
		|> List.map int_of_string
	in
	solve a
	|> print_int
	|> print_newline

N = int(readline())

def test(x):
    # x
    B = (A >= x)
    # 
    flag = np.zeros(N+N-1,np.bool)
    flag[:-1] = (B[:-1] == B[1:])
    # 
    """ version
    L = np.where(flag[:N])[0].max(initial=-1) + 1
    R = np.where(flag[N-1:-1])[0].min(initial=N-2) + N
    """
    x = np.where(flag[:N])[0]
    L = x.max() + 1 if len(x) >= 1 else 0
    x = np.where(flag[N-1:-1])[0]
    R = x.min() + N if len(x) >= 1 else N+N-2
    if (N-1)-L > R-(N-1):
        return B[R]
    else:
        return B[L]
